content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling has Sweden’s premier practice representing founder-led companies in the mid- to late stage phases of their journey.

We are well versed in Unicorn-class investment practices and regularly assist our clients in partnering with international VCs and growth investors. We work almost exclusively on the company side, with a special focus on implementing sound going-forward governance models and capital structures, fundraisings, equity incentive programmes and exit strategies. Our practice is to work closely with founder and management teams as well as key shareholders to understand, inform and contribute to their current needs and long-term goals.

Please feel free to contact any of the partners listed on the right if you would like to hear more about us and our practice, and discuss how we might be able to help.
